Sentencas: Solid electrolytes of cubic structure employed in Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC) like ceria (CeO2) and zirconia (ZrO2) are typically doped with a single selected element from the (Y, lanthanide)-series.
Titulo: Lanthanide co-doping of solid electrolytes: AC conductivity behaviour

Sentencas: Co-doping of ceria with several elements is investigated here in terms of its influence on ionic conductivity.
Titulo: Lanthanide co-doping of solid electrolytes: AC conductivity behaviour

Sentencas: It is found that, for a same total dopant concentration, mixtures of dopants give a higher total ionic conductivity (by 10-30%) than the best singly doped material.
Titulo: Lanthanide co-doping of solid electrolytes: AC conductivity behaviour
